text: The 1933–34 Kentucky Wildcats men's basketball team represented the University of Kentucky in intercollegiate basketball during the 1933–34 season. The team finished the season with a 16–1 record and was retroactively named the national champion by the Premo-Porretta Power Poll. ==References== Category:Kentucky Wildcats men's basketball seasons Kentucky Category:NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament championship seasons Kentucky Wildcats Men's Basketball Team Kentucky Wildcats Men's Basketball Team
title: 1933–34 Kentucky Wildcats men's basketball team
